A Special Letter To Everyone From Lisa!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): A Special Letter To Everyone From Lisa!
By Lisa Shock on Monday, September 18, 2000 - 09:25 pm:

Last week, Tecmo posted a message on their board saying they were going to update their links, and they asked for URL submissions for sites not currently listed. Of course, I sent an email right away! (I've been bugging them for months to look into this.)

I recieved an email from Michelle at Tecmo and thought you'd like to read it:

I am sooo impressed with your site. You are the first link I am submitting.
Thank you for all of your work.
thanks,
michelle

I'd like to thank everyone here for working to make this site what it is today! From the long-time regulars who endured imposters and hackers and a big move, to the people who found us later - everyone one of you has added a bit to a structure that is greater than any of us could have built alone!
I salute you!
-Lisa

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, September 26, 2000 - 08:43 pm:

Well, to quote Scotty in Star Trek (^_~ -I know it's an older saying!) "Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice shame on me!" I make two copies, one is in a secure fire-proof vault several miles away, just in case something happens to my house.
